4XX.description: Invalid arguments, planned downtime or not found data

400.description: Request error by the client (missing query for example)

403.description: Forbidden to connect to the Riot API (mainly maintenance reasons on riot side like patches) or to the HenrikDev API itself because of bot prevention for example

404.description: The entity was not found (player/match/general data)

429.description: Rate limit reached (can be global API limit which affects all users or just you, when the "x-ratelimit-remaining" header is 0 then it's a personal limit)

5XX.description: Internal Error of any kind, for more info check the details string

500.description: Internal Error (error is logged, will be reviewed asap)

501.description: API Version not implemented, check the requested endpoint url

503.description: Riot API seems to be down, API unable to connect

content.example: The platform is currently unavailable while we perform emergency maintenance.
